title: Episode 281: Your Stupid Drives Me Crazy (Feat. Phresher & Jenn The Groupie Slayer)
itunes:title: Episode 281: Your Stupid Drives Me Crazy (Feat. Phresher & Jenn The Groupie Slayer)
description:
This week Phresher and his lovely wife Jenn promote his new YouTube show, “Just Me and My Bacon Egg and Cheese.” Phresher breaks down exactly what happened, in full detail, when he was beaten, robbed, and almost kidnapped earlier this year. Jenn opened up about the traumas her and the family faced after this this horrific incident, and the recovery process that was required. Aside from this, Phresher and Jenn are very honest when speaking about the ups and downs of their relationship. Jenn even had to go as far as leaving him with an empty house to get her point across. Enjoy!
